UCLA fault-tolerant Quantum Programming Community

UCLA fault-tolerant Quantum Programming Community

Welcome to the Quantum Programming Community!

We bring together researchers, students, and developers working on:

  • Quantum programming languages
  • Quantum compilers and optimizations
  • Quantum error correction (QEC)
  • Simulation and benchmarking

We provide end-to-end compilation solution and bcenchmarking for quantum fault-tolerant applications.

  • Fault-tolerant benchmarks

Our mission is to build an open, collaborative community for quantum programming â€” sharing code, ideas, and results. We design new fault-tolerant quantum programming language
